Topic.Title: Why the valuation of Local Corp with lower than 40 million is one of the biggest jokes the Nasdaq had ever seen

Message.Msg: It is a joke, that Yelp has the 50-fold market-cap and Tumblr the 27-fold price of Local Corp, but both less US-Monthly-Unique-Visitors (newest numbers from Siteanalytics), now with complete numbers of Tumblr . Local Corp (market-cap of 40 million) development of Unique Visitors: 11/2012: 18,745,842 Monthly Unique Visitors 12/2012: 22,738,206 Monthly Unique Visitors 01/2013: 26,410,927 Monthly Unique Visitors 02/2013: 24,017,605 Monthly Unique Visitors 03/2013: 24,427,755 Monthly Unique Visitors 04/2013: 23,785,928 Monthly Unique Visitors Compare with the development of Yelp's (market-cap of 2 billion) Unique Visitors: 11/2012: 19,358,705 Monthly Unique Visitors 12/2012: 21,017,483 Monthly Unique Visitors 01/2013: 22,293,301 Monthly Unique Visitors 02/2013: 21,063,155 Monthly Unique Visitors 03/2013: 23,364,095 Monthly Unique Visitors 04/2013: 22,252,993 Monthly Unique Visitors Compare with the development of Tumblr’s (offer of Yahoo of 1.1 billion) Unique Visitors: 11/2012: 24,610,970 Monthly Unique Visitors 12/2012: 26,348,660 Monthly Unique Visitors 01/2013: 26,003,223 Monthly Unique Visitors 02/2013: 24,082,558 Monthly Unique Visitors 03/2013: 22,990,413 Monthly Unique Visitors 04/2013: 23,21,082 Monthly Unique Visitors

Topic.Title: This SUCKS

Message.Msg: You should asking yourself, why was this up? Too many lemmings got in (mini bubble) as it went parabolic before coming back down. ALSO, worries that the fed is gonna shut down their printing press this June. Profit taking too. Sell everything and come back at the end of summer when everything will be cheaper.

Topic.Title: This SUCKS

Message.Msg: Ah yes, the eternal why. The answer is, it's down because it's not going up or staying the same. In the end, stocks have their own animal spirits. They move because they move, and you have to be objective or you will lose all your money. Once I was long but now I'm short (after I bought 920 calls last month that expired worthless). I made $ on the way up, now I'm making money on the way down (to $820, JMHO). Don't deny what anyone can see by consulting a chart. There are no heros among investors.

Message.Title: why the big drop today
Message.Msg: what is the reason for the sell off today

Message.Title: GOOG & Samsung will battle - both will get hurt APPL wins
Message.Msg: We have two Billion$ corporations tied at the hip but one can't control the other. If Samsung builds cheap hardware(and they have) Android looks like #$%$. If Samsung wants a new feature they can't spin the OS. To keep the big S inline GOOG purchased MOT, Samsung now has their OS supplier as a competitor. As each try's to protect their market - the relationship starts to chip away. I have a feeling that Samsung has a Linux based OS up there sleeve. The main reason MSFT never built a PC is it would scare away their customers- The X-phone will put this stock into a tail spin- GOOG wants to be MSFT and AAPL it won't work!
